fetchValueSetSecurityObjectName

public static java.lang.String fetchValueSetSecurityObjectName(java.lang.String valueSetCode)
fetchValueSetSecurityObjectName method checks for valueset security object for given value set code. It creates one if does not exist already.

Parameters:
valueSetCode - String as ValueSetCode
Returns:
Security Object name associated with given value set code

Parameters:

addValueSetSecurityGrant : Method to add grant for given filter condition,role name, and value set code.

Parameters:
roleName - roleName to be used
valueSetCode - Value Set Code for which Global access has to be provided
conditionName - condition name to be used for given filter condition
filterXML - ClobDomain for FilterXML
